1.0.1.name: wordpress/futuristica
1.0.1.description: The Futuristica theme for WordPress 3.5+ is a futuristic, modern, customizable, clean, and readable with a custom created background by the german digital artist Ali Karababa. Create your own custom menu, you can also upload your own custom background and give your theme an individual touch. Futuristica supports six widgetized areas (two in the sidebar, four in the footer) and featured images. Custom Title Color. Stylesheet for print and the admin Visual Editor, special styles for posts in the "Asides" and "Gallery" categories, and has an optional one-column page template that removes the sidebar.
